alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 2:41PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rankin and central Hinds Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 240 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Johns to 7 miles southeast of Brandon to near Florence. Movement was northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Florence and Monterey around 245 PM CDT. Byram and Richland around 250 PM CDT. Pearl and Brandon around 255 PM CDT. Jackson around 300 PM CDT. Flowood and Pelahatchie around 305 PM CDT. Clinton around 315 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. High winds can bring down trees and large limbs resulting in serious injury or property damage. Exercise extreme caution when outdoors during such strong winds...and be especially aware of older trees.
